name: Greenie - a space adventure!
description:
Meet Greenie - the alien space agent! Help our little hero with his mission to retrieve a missing fellow agent and a lost navigation code. All played out in a dangerous sector in space controlled by the lea,n mean interdimensional creatures and their minions. An adventure/platform/arcade crossover game.

Touch or mouse input

Arrows to move, space to fire or repair, ctrl or numbers to activate action icons/or alternative touch controls

Good luck!

It's nice to be outside! Greenie on a spacewalk with assistant Searching through an apparently not so derelict old vessle, after all
Setting the navigation in a UFO can be a puzzle
Quantum subspace is a confusing place
